data.eml:eml: The genus Syllis Savigny in Lamarck, 1818 (Annelida: Syllidae: Syllinae) from Australia (second part): four new species and re-description of twelve previously described species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martín, Guillermo San, Álvarez-Campos, Patricia, Hutchings, Pat (2017): The genus Syllis Savigny in Lamarck, 1818 (Annelida: Syllidae: Syllinae) from Australia (second part): four new species and re-description of twelve previously described species. Zootaxa 4237 (2): 201-243, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4237.2.1
